mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT id) AS cluesNum FROM `tb_clue` WHERE id IN (SELECT assign_id FROM `tb_assign_record` WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND `type` = 0 AND `latest` = 1 AND `user_name` = #{username}) AND `status` IN (1, 2)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (id)) AS businessNum FROM `tb_business` WHERE id IN (SELECT assign_id FROM `tb_assign_record` WHERE DATE_FORMAT(`create_time`, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND `type` = 1 AND `latest` = 1 AND `user_name` = #{username}) AND `status` IN (1, 2)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(tc.id)) AS TofollowedCluesNum FROM tb_clue tc left join tb_assign_record tar on tc.id = tar.assign_id where DATE_FORMAT(tar.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} and tc.status = 1 and tar.type = 0 and tar.latest = 1;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS toallocatedCluesNum FROM tb_clue WHERE id not in (Select DISTINCT (assign_id) FROM tb_assign_record)

SELECT count(1) as num,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') dd from tb_clue
and date_format(create_time,'%y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{beginCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endCreateTime},'%y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY dd;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT id) FROM tb_business WHERE clue_id in (SELECT id AS cluesNums FROM `tb_clue` WHERE status in ('1', '3', '6', '7') and DATE_FORMAT(`create_time`, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) and status in (1, 2)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT id) FROM tb_contract WHERE business_id in (SELECT id FROM tb_business WHERE clue_id in (SELECT id AS cluesNums FROM `tb_clue` WHERE status in ('1', '3', '6', '7') and DATE_FORMAT(`create_time`, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) and status in (1, 2))

select create_by, dept_name, num, FORMAT(num / sumnum, 2) radio FROM (select c.create_by, d.dept_name, count(DISTINCT (c.id)) as num FROM tb_contract c left join sys_dept d ON c.dept_id = d.dept_id GROUP BY c.create_by ORDER BY count(DISTINCT (c.id)) DESC limit 10) a, (select COUNT(id) sumnum FROM tb_business WHERE DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}) b

select tb.create_by, dept_name, COUNT(tc.id) num, FORMAT(COUNT(tc.id) / allnum, 2) radio FROM tb_clue tc left join tb_business tb on tc.id = tb.clue_id left join tb_assign_record tar on tb.id = tar.assign_id left join sys_dept sd on sd.dept_id = tar.dept_id left join sys_user su on su.user_id = tar.user_id , (select count(tb_clue.id) allnum FROM tb_clue) numc WHERE tc.status = 6 group by tc.create_by and DATE_FORMAT(tc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} order by num DESC
